Title: reinterpretAsUInt128
Description: Performs byte reinterpretation by treating the input value as a value of type UInt128. Unlike CAST, the function does not attempt to preserve the original value - if the target type is not able to represent the input type, the output is meaningless.
x: value to byte reinterpret as UInt128. (U)Int*, Float, Date, DateTime, UUID, String or FixedString.
Reinterpreted value x as UInt128. UInt128.
Examples: SELECT    toUInt64(257) AS x,    toTypeName(x),    reinterpretAsUInt128(x) AS res,    toTypeName(res)
